info.description: A RESTful API for an e-commerce application. This API will handle basic CRUD operations for products and orders, and provide user management and authentication.
info.title: Shopper Management API

get.description: Get all orders for authenticated user
get.summary: Get all orders for authenticated user

put.description: Update the status of an order by ID

post.description: Create a new product with name, description, and price

put.description: Update a product's name, description, and price

post.description: Register a new user with email and password
Login a user with email and password

data.description: The data returned by the API

message.description: A message providing additional information about the response

success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful

JWT.description: JWT security accessToken. Please add it in the format "Bearer {AccessToken}" to authorize your requests.
JWT.name: Authorization

scopes.admin: Grants read and write access to administrative information
